snippet: The popular musical about the lives and loves of downtown New York artists in the era of AIDS will close at New World Stages on Sept. 9, a little more than a year after the production opened there.
abstract: The popular musical about the lives and loves of downtown New York artists in the era of AIDS will close at New World Stages on Sept. 9, a little more than a year after the production opened there.

headline.main: Off Broadway Revival of 'Rent' to Close
